name: PS5 Simulator
description:
Can't wait for new PS5, but don't have it yet? 

Wait no more, your ultimate PS5 experience is here! Poor cable management, snacks on floor and try to not break your next-game console in this non-AAA-game!

Freatures:
  • Top-notch realistic graphic without RTX
  • Physics almost everywhere - Newton not happy about it
  • Start playing your PS5 early
  • Worst cable management included - just like in real life
Made by Alex Grade (Youtube)

Assets used:
HQ Residential House
Playstation 5
Xbox controller
PS4 controller
Carboard boxes
Scissor
HDMI cable
Plash Speed 5g router
Wrench
Chips bag
